Title: I am Extremely Magic
Plot: Charlie has a new magic kit and dazzles Lola with his tricks. Lola asks him to teach her magic, but Charlie says that he can't --- it wouldn't be magic if he could. Lola thinks that if Charlie is magic, that must mean that she is too. With the help of her imaginary friend, Soren Lorensen, she does her best to do tricks, but comes up empty. She's ready to give up, but Charlie has some ideas to help.
GuestStars: Charlie Scoular,  Luke Booker-Morel,  Annalise  Liard-Bailey,  Abel Lundie-Brown,  Anabel Williams,  Lars Finlay
